en: I will fully cooperate with you
zh: 我將全力配合您

en: It's been a while
zh: 有一陣子了

en: Shouldn't you go to bed?
zh: 你不應該去睡覺嗎？

en: How've you been?
zh: 最近怎麼樣？

en: I'm not used to speaking English
zh: 我不習慣講英文

en: I will watch movies and comics to study
zh: 我會看電影與漫畫學習

en: But I think I still need someone to talk to me
zh: 但我認為我還是需要人跟我講話

en: Because we have more than 10 kinds of projects
zh: 因為我們有10種以上的專案

en: It will take a lot of time
zh: 這會花很多時間

en: Sorry, I forgot, I can't answer you
zh: 對不起，我忘記了，我不能回答你

en: Thanks for talking to me
zh: 謝謝你與我交談

en: I do not know what to say
zh: 我不知該說什麼

en: I have no AWS experience
zh: 我沒有AWS的經驗

en: But I said it badly
zh: 但我說的很差

en: May I ask some questions?
zh: 我可以請問一些問題嗎？

en: It is hard to say
zh: 這個不好說

en: You are a special girl to me
zh: 對我來說你是個很特別女孩

en: If there really is no way, I suggest...
zh: 如果真的沒有辦法,我建議...

en: I can only speak some simple English
zh: 我只能說一些簡單的英文

en: I will take a look.
zh: 我會看一下

en: What does this mean?
zh: 這是什麼意思？

en: Show favorites list only
zh: 僅顯示收藏夾列表

en: I want to ask who got this job QQ?
zh: 我想問一下誰得到了這個工作 QQ？

en: Excuse me, are you referring to me?
zh: 打擾一下，您指的是我嗎？？

en: I practice English very hard.
zh: 我非常努力地練習英語。

en: This is what I created from scratch
zh: 這是我從頭開始創建的

en: I like white, it gives me a sense of innocence, optimism and a very sacred feeling
zh: 我喜歡白色，它給我一種純真、樂觀和一種很神聖的感覺

en: I have several questions about this issue.
zh: 對於這個問題我有幾個疑問。

en: Don't worry about this problem.
zh: 不用擔心這個問題。

en: I don't want to teach others bad habits.
zh: 我不想教別人壞習慣。

en: I haven't opened VRChat in at least a year.
zh: 我至少有一年沒有打開 VRChat 了。

en: The most important thing during the interview is to be in a good mood.
zh: 面試的時候最重要的是心情好。

en: With this tool, my English skills are bound to improve.
zh: 有了這個工具，我的英語程度一定會提升。

en: I'm waiting for you to introduce girls to me.
zh: 我等著你跟我介紹女孩子。

en: Did the company you interviewed with last time not accept you?
zh: 上次面試的公司沒有錄取你嗎？

en: Don't hesitate, just take off with no regrets?
zh: 來一次遠走高飛 再猶豫就別後悔？

en: Always placing other's priorities first, leaving myself for last
zh: 任何事都為別人 自己擺在最後面

en: Can you give me some tips for improving my programming skills?
zh: 你能給我一些提高編程技能的建議嗎？

en: How can I prepare for a technical interview?
zh: 我該如何為技術面試做準備？

en: If I only have the frontend without backend server support, what methods can I use to store data on the client side?
zh: 如果我只有前端，沒有後端服務器支援，那麼我可以使用什麼方法在客戶端存儲資料?

en: Of course, as long as you're brave enough to try.
zh: 當然可以，只要你敢嘗試。

en: Sure, why not? Anything's possible if you're brave enough.
zh: 當然可以，為什麼不呢？只要你足夠勇敢，一切皆有可能。

en: Well, that depends. Are you ready for a little adventure?
zh: 這取決於情況。你準備好迎接一點冒險了嗎？

en: In my heart, Casper, my senior, is the most awesome.
zh: 在我心裡，我的學長 Casper 是最香的。

en: Now, when I'm confessing my feelings to you.
zh: 現在，當我向你坦白我的感情時。

en: I also think so.
zh: 我也是這樣想。

en: Please introduce me to a girl who can save me years of struggle.
zh: 請介紹一個能讓我少奮鬥幾年的女孩。

en: Every day, I'm doing my best.
zh: 每一天，我都在盡我最大的努力。

en: I specially created a web application to learn English.
zh: 我為了學英文特地做了一個網頁應用程式。

en: The triggers for my PTSD are usually not subjects, but people and teachers.
zh: 觸發我的創傷後壓力症候群的通常不是主題，而是人和老師。

en: Good evening, Big Rabbit.
zh: 晚上好，大兔子。

en: Modify the copy function prompt message.
zh: 修改複製功能的提示訊息。

en: Incorporate several new sentences into the JSON file.
zh: 將幾個新句子納入 JSON 檔案中。

en: You are gorgeous.
zh: 你真漂亮。

en: I switched my phone and computer to English mode to practice English.
zh: 我將手機和電腦切換到英文模式來練習英文。

en: No special reason, just studying for work.
zh: 沒有特別的原因，只是為工作學習。

en: Modify CSS styles and layout.
zh: 修改 CSS 樣式和佈局。

en: Add voice translation feature.
zh: 添加語音翻譯功能。

en: Convert a standalone useState boolean to a useState object.
zh: 將獨立的 useState 布爾值轉換為一個 useState 對象。

en: Move the function to a shared file.
zh: 將函數移動到共享文件。

en: I added (Promise.all and db_usestate) to check if the data has been loaded.
zh: 我添加了（Promise.all 和 db_usestate）來檢查數據是否已加載。

en: Long time no see, how have you been?
zh: 好久不見，你過得怎麼樣？

en: Because I've had a slight cold recently.
zh: 因為我最近有點感冒。

en: Yes, I was born in Taiwan.
zh: 是的，我出生在台灣。

en: You are my idol.
zh: 你是我的偶像。

en: I'm really a rookie, I never pretend to be otherwise.
zh: 我真的是個新手，我從不假裝不是。

en: Okay, let's practice English together!
zh: 好喔，我們一起練習英文吧！

en: Is it possible to work fully remotely at [Hsu Shen]'s company?
zh: 在[徐深]的公司可以完全遠距工作嗎?

en: I believe this may cause problems, I recommend synchronizing the names.
zh: 我相信這可能會引起問題,我建議同步名稱。

en: Trust me, you are better than me.
zh: 相信我，你比我更好。

en: I'm dead, you're so good at guessing.
zh: 笑死，你猜得太準了。

en: Education in Taiwan involves too much rote learning.
zh: 台灣的教育涉及太多的死記硬背。

en: Did your job interview go well last time?
zh: 你上次的面試順利嗎？

en: Last time, I remember you asked a question about unit testing in C#.
zh: 上次，我記得你問了一個關於 C# 單元測試的問題。

en: i can hear your voice
zh: 我聽得到你的聲音

en: Do you enjoy coding, or do you just see it as a job?
zh: 您喜歡編碼，還是只是將其視為一份工作？

en: If my English sounds weird, please let me know!
zh: 如果有說的英文很奇怪請跟我說XD

en: If someone say something impolite, you could say this~
zh: 如果有人說了不禮貌的話，你可以這麼說~

en: I have 8 years of software engineering experience. I currently mainly do [React Native] mobile front-end work.
zh: 我有 8 年的軟體工程經驗。我目前主要做【React Native】移動前端工作。

en: i also have many side projects XD
zh: 我還有很多自己的專案 XD

en: Thanks to Teacher Ning for inviting Shan to DC.
zh: 感謝寧老師邀請單來DC。

en: I have a question
zh: 我有個問題

en: Really, everyone is so talented, they know English.
zh: 真的，每個人都很有才華，他們都懂英文。

en: Do you play games in your leisure time?
zh: 你閒暇時玩遊戲嗎？

en: For example, do you play mobile games, computer games, or board games?
zh: 例如，您玩手機遊戲、電腦遊戲還是棋盤遊戲？

en: The side project I started two weeks ago.
zh: 我兩週前開始的個人專案。

en: I started this side project because I wanted to learn English.
zh: 我開始這個個人專案是因為我想學習英語。

en: Well america hiring is very strategic
zh: 美國的招募非常具有戰略意義

en: See you next time, hope to see you again, thank you for sharing today
zh: 下次見，希望再次見到你，感謝你今天的分享

en: Shan is now a full-stack engineer, previously had PM experience, lives in Taiwan, and is 30 years old this year.
zh: Shan 現在是全端工程師，之前有 PM 經歷，住在台灣，今年 30 歲。

en: We should hang out together next time.
zh: 下次我們應該一起出去玩。

en: Let's hang out together.
zh: 我們一起出去玩吧。

en: Sometimes on call is required, sometimes it isn't.
zh: 有時需要隨叫隨到，有時則不需要。

en: I really enjoy playing games.
zh: 我很喜歡玩遊戲。

en: Whether it’s mobile games, computer games or tabletop games, I play them all.
zh: 無論是手機遊戲、電腦遊戲或是桌遊戲，我都玩。

en: Me too. I get off work late.
zh: 我和你一樣。我下班很晚。

en: I'm not gay, I like girls, girls like you.
zh: 我不是同性戀，我喜歡女孩，我喜歡像你這樣的女孩。

en: I speak softly because I want to be gentle with you.
zh: 我說話輕聲是因為我想對你溫柔。

en: So you really like him?
zh: 所以妳很喜歡他嗎?

en: I understand how you feel.
zh: 我理解你的感受。

en: I'm watching a short video and chatting with you.
zh: 我在看短影片，一邊跟你聊天。

en: I do both.
zh: 我兩者都做。

en: I ride my motorcycle first and then take the subway.
zh: 我先騎摩托車，然後搭地鐵。

en: Haha XD Is this the point?
zh: 哈哈XD這是重點嗎？

en: No one wants to talk, let’s start writing programs
zh: 沒人願意說話，我們開始寫程序吧

en: Did you have a good day?
zh: 你今天過得愉快嗎？

en: I need seniors to guide me
zh: 我需要前輩來指導我

en: Because many job vacancies require you to know redux, but I think it is not easy to use it and write it.
zh: 因為很多職缺都要求你會redux，但我覺得用它、寫它並不容易。

en: I want to know the advantages and disadvantages of redux
zh: 我想知道redux的優點和缺點

en: Do you still want to keep in touch with him?
zh: 你還想和他保持聯絡嗎？

en: I think you are the best when you are yourself.
zh: 我認為做你自己,你就是最好的

en: I noticed you were very emotional.
zh: 我注意到你非常情緒化。

en: I'm trying my best to chat with you using GOOGLE Translate
zh: 我正在努力使用 GOOGLE 翻譯與您聊天

en: Yes, I listened to your recording carefully
zh: 是的，我仔細聽了你的錄音

en: Yes, I can feel your displeasure.
zh: 是的，我能感受到你的不悅

en: Can you try to chat without using the Translate app?
zh: 您可以嘗試在不使用翻譯應用程式的情況下聊天嗎？

en: I'm trying my best to take notes and study English
zh: 我正在盡力做筆記和學習英語

en: I will put the English notes into my programming project
zh: 我會把英文筆記放到我的程式設計專案中

en: Oh thank you, you are an angel
zh: 噢，謝謝你，你是天使

en: I think you are doing very well so don't worry
zh: 我認為你做得很好所以不用擔心

en: This sentence is too long and difficult
zh: 這句話太長太難了

en: I can still understand what you are saying means You are actually doing fine. I think what you need to do more is to practice on the fluency and your grammar and pronunciation on certain words
zh: 我仍然能理解你所說的話意味著你實際上做得很好。我認為你需要做的更多的是練習流利度以及某些單字的語法和發音

en: Are there no earthquakes in Singapore?
zh: 新加坡沒有地震嗎？

en: Anything serious like catastrophe happens to Singapore that means to Earth is going to bye-bye
zh: 任何像災難這樣嚴重的事情發生在新加坡，就意味著地球將要再見了

en: If you encounter a disaster in the future, remember to tell me and I will write a suicide note.
zh: 如果以後遇到災難，記得告訴我，我會寫遺書。

en: I am easy to take care of and only eat two meals a day.
zh: 我很容易照顧，一天只吃兩餐。

en: It may depend on how much is your salary in Taiwan dollars?
zh: 可能要看你的薪水是多少台幣？

en: Well, after all, there are differences in salaries between different professions.
zh: 嗯，畢竟不同職業之間的薪資是有差異的。

en: The reason why I say that the salary in Singapore is very high, Because among the people I know, almost all Taiwanese engineers who go to work in Singapore earn more than NT$2 million.
zh: 我之所以說新加坡的薪水很高，因為我認識的人中，幾乎所有去新加坡工作的台灣工程師的收入都超過新台幣200萬元。

en: Okay, no problem, I'll wait for you to come to Taiwan
zh: 好的，沒問題，我等你來台灣

en: How long do you expect the trial period to be?
zh: 您預計試用期多長？

en: I will wait for you to stabilize and let you go to work
zh: 我會等你穩定下來讓你去上班

en: No problem, I will take care of you for three months first
zh: 沒問題，我先照顧你三個月

en: I think anything is possible
zh: 我認為一切皆有可能

en: Because I am a person who likes hugging very much
zh: 因為我是一個很喜歡擁抱的人

en: Do you think I will believe that you are only three years old?
zh: 你以為我會相信你才三歲嗎？

en: Well, I believe you, only today
zh: 好吧，我相信你，只有今天

en: So many new friends showed up at this event.
zh: 這次活動吸引了許多新朋友。

en: I'm learning OPA, it's so difficult QQ
zh: 我正在學OPA，好難啊QQ

en: No problem, the capable should be the teacher. Senior, please teach me JAVA.
zh: 沒問題，達者為師。請前輩教我JAVA。

en: Just buy it, Action is better than thinking in heart only
zh: 買就對了,心動不如行動

en: I will be updating the .md file and tutorials here gradually. If anyone feels there are areas that need modification, feel free to help make changes together.
zh: 我這邊陸續會更新.md檔跟教學,大家如果覺得有地方修改可以一起幫忙改

en: I strive to become the husband who can support you financially.? Haha
zh: 我努力成為能養你的老公?哈哈

en: I just finished being busy, sweetheart. Goodnight.
zh: 我剛忙完,寶貝晚安

en: Welcome to the world of Java.
zh: 歡迎來到Java的世界。

en: I think you need someone to warm you.
zh: 我想你需要一個人溫暖你。

en: Do you have your mother's phone number?
zh: 你有你媽的電話嗎？

en: My current company does not accept remote work.
zh: 我現在的公司不接受遠程工作。

en: No, I just have a room to myself.
zh: 不，只是我自己有一個房間。

en: I think your home is big XD?
zh: 我覺得你家很大XD？

en: Does your family rent or own a home?
zh: 你的家人租房還是買房？

en: I’m just a tenant.
zh: 我只是一個租戶。

en: Let me think about it. How many brothers and sisters do you have?
zh: 讓我想想。你有幾個兄弟姊妹？

en: Is buying a house in Singapore permanent?
zh: 在新加坡買房子是永久的嗎？

en: I was just thinking why 'flat' instead of 'apartment'.
zh: 我只是在想為什麼用“flat”而不是“apartment”。

en: Looks pretty good. If our sister moves out, tell me (X).
zh: 看起來還不錯。如果我們姐姐搬出去了,告訴我（X）。

en: Only after updating and logging in can you enter the invite friend page.
zh: 更新並登入後才能進入邀請好友頁面。

en: I uploaded some sample files including [Integrate with Go API] [Integrate with REST API].
zh: 我上傳了一些範例文件，包括[與Go API整合][與REST API整合]。

en: My 'GPT-4' upgrade has also been purchased.
zh: 我的“GPT-4”升級也已購買。

en: It may be necessary to discuss whether we are sure to only rely on the [Go] framework? Or would we consider relying on REST API?
zh: 可能有必要討論我們是否確定只依賴[Go]框架？或者我們會考慮依賴REST API？

en: The software is great, but the company won't let me work remotely, which makes me miserable.
zh: 軟體很棒，但是公司不讓我遠程工作，這讓我很痛苦。

en: I just told him directly that the salary is higher than my previous job.
zh: 我都直接跟他說比我前一份工作薪水高就行。

en: I can introduce it to you if you want.
zh: 如果你願意的話我可以介紹給你。

en: Which company?
zh: 哪家公司？

en: I don't argue about salary, I just look at how much the company adds. If it was lower or only +1k3k, I would consider not going.
zh: 我不爭論薪資，只看公司加多少。如果更低或只有+1k3k，我會考慮不去。

en: I noticed XD I'm currently in sync with Jacky and using the latest development branch.
zh: 我有注意到 XD 我目前與 Jacky 同步並使用最新的開發分支。

en: If we are sure that our product will not use other frameworks or languages to call OPA server in the future, then we will use [Integrate with Go API].
zh: 如果我們確定我們的產品以後不會使用其他框架或語言來呼叫 OPA 伺服器，那麼我們就會使用【與Go API整合】。

en: Because the two writing methods are different, one is through Integrate with REST API.
zh: 因為兩種寫法不同，一種是透過Integrate with REST API。

en: OK, Because the official has a direct call to the REST API XD, That's why I want to confirm with you.
zh: OK，因為官方有直接呼叫 REST API 的 XD，所以想跟你確認一下。

en: Why are you at home?
zh: 你為什麼在家？

en: You know what? It's because you didn't sleep with me.
zh: 你知道嗎？那是因為你沒有跟我睡。

en: Was it my fault all along XD?
zh: 一直以來都是我的錯嗎XD？

en: Does your company provide paid leave?
zh: 貴公司提供有薪休假嗎？

en: Then you can still be a thief of 13 days' salary.
zh: 那你還可以當 13 天工資的小偷。

en: Ask her to let my wife continue to rest at home.
zh: 求她讓我老婆繼續在家休息。

en: Didn’t you say you have a salary?
zh: 你不是說你有薪水嗎？

en: I tell your boss, it's okay, I can go to work instead of you.
zh: 我告訴你老闆，沒關係，我可以代替你去上班。

en: I have fresh liver.
zh: 我有新鮮的肝臟。

en: I can only sleep with you around my arms.
zh: 我只能抱著你入睡。

en: Hmm I think you don't have to say 「on site」.
zh: 嗯，我想你不必說“現場”。

en: I mean to accompany me via voice call.
zh: 我的意思是透過語音通話陪伴我。

en: But you can't feel my warmth just by my voice.
zh: 但僅憑我的聲音你無法感受到我的溫暖。

en: I feel like I'm going to get a knock on the door from my family.XDD.
zh: 我感覺我的家人會來敲門。

en: What time do you go to bed?
zh: 你什麼時候睡覺？

en: I have a meeting until eleven today.
zh: 我今天有一個會議要開到十一點。

en: No, I think it will be noisy.
zh: 不，我覺得會很吵。

en: Not yet, I still have two hours left before I get off work.
zh: 還沒有，距離下班還有兩個小時。

en: Because today is the birthday of the Malaysian head of state?
zh: 因為今天是馬來西亞國家元首的生日？

en: What has that got to do with you@@?
zh: 這和你有什麼關係@@？

en: Because I'm alone in Taiwan, I need to commute to the office for an hour every day, and I work remotely with colleagues from Malaysia using Teams.
zh: 因為我獨自一人在台灣，我需要每天花一個小時通勤到辦公室，使用 Teams 與馬來西亞的同事遠距工作。

en: The colleagues I work with are all Malaysians.
zh: 和我一起工作的同事都是馬來西亞人。

en: So, with all the [PM/QA/IT/BE] on leave today, I'm the salary thief.
zh: 所以，今天所有的 [PM/QA/IT/BE] 都休假了，我就是薪資小偷。

en: No way, the company requires me to go to the company to work remotely with my Malaysian colleagues.
zh: 沒辦法,公司要求我到公司使用遠端去和我的馬來西亞同事一起工作。

en: Ok, I'm going to learn to read official documents.
zh: 好的，我去學習看官方文檔。

en: We don't use this term.
zh: 我們不使用這個術語。

en: Let's chat later.
zh: 我們稍後再聊吧。

en: We don't use this term.
zh: 我們不使用這個術語。

en: I want to learn English because I need to use it for my work.
zh: 我想學英文是因為我工作會需要用。

en: I just want to ask if you fall asleep?
zh: 我只想問你睡著了嗎？

en: I remember showing you my English project.
zh: 我記得我有給你看過我的英文專案。

en: But there's no one around me in Taiwan who speaks English.
zh: 但是我在台灣身邊沒人講英文。

en: I think your approach is great, and I agree with what you're thinking.
zh: 我覺得你的做法很棒,我跟你想的一樣。

en: I'll brush my teeth if you fall asleep
zh: 如果你睡著了我就刷牙

en: I'm working on this project right now.
zh: 我現在在做這個專案

en: Because I'm not smart enough.
zh: 因為我不夠聰明

en: You don't have to be so serious.
zh: 你不必那麼認真

en: What time do you want to sleep?
zh: 你想什麼時候睡覺？

en: What time do you have to get up for work?
zh: 你幾點要起床上班？

en: Okay, I'm going to brush my teeth. You go to sleep early.
zh: 好吧，我去刷牙。你早點睡吧。

en: Sweet dreams
zh: 祝你有個好夢

en: I just arrived at the company
zh: 我剛到公司

en: Which part of this is good?
zh: 這邊的不錯是指什麼部分＠＠？

en: I am a slacker
zh: 我是一個薪水小偷

en: Hi, my supervisor wants me to track [代收代付]. Is there anything else that needs to be changed? If not, we are ready to deploy UAT into the environment to complete this order
zh: 你好，我的主管要我追蹤[代收代付]。還有什麼需要改變的嗎？如果沒有，我們準備將 UAT 部署到環境中來完成此訂單

en: Reorganizing Project Architecture
zh: 重整專案結構

en: There's a company event after 5 PM today.
zh: 今天下午5點以後公司有活動。

en: End the interview directly (x
zh: 直接結束面試（x

en: I didn't type; I copied it using a program I wrote.
zh: 我沒有打字；我用我寫的程式複製了它XD。

en: They have been interviewing for a long time.
zh: 他們已經面試了很久了。

en: My Genshin Impact still hasn't finished downloading the update.
zh: 我的 Genshin Impact 仍未完成更新下載。

en: There should be only [Iterator] in java
zh: java中應該只有[Iterator]

en: I need to set up Actions secrets and variables. Please grant me the necessary permissions, and I will configure them when I have time.
zh: 我需要設Actions secrets and variables,麻煩開權限給我,我有空再設定

en: It doesn't matter, just use it if you have time haha
zh: 沒關係，有時間就用吧哈哈

en: I'm almost off work, so I'll take some time to practice GCP. XD
zh: 我快下班了，所以抽點時間練習一下gcp XD

en: I tested it on my own go project and it works.
zh: 我測我自己的go project是可以的

en: But I still need permissions to test our Mai Today project since my project is just a Hello World app. XD
zh: 但還需要權限來測試我們的 mai Today 項目,畢竟我的專案只有hello world XD

en: I need setting permissions to enter.
zh: 我需要setting的權限才能進去

en: Although I could hardcode it, it's not recommended. XD
zh: 雖然可以寫死 但不建議XD

en: Because I saw that L is also using secrets.
zh: 因為我看到(Ｌ)也是用secrets

en: When I read your resume, I already decided that you are my idol.
zh: 當我讀你的履歷那一刻,我已經決定你是我的偶像

en: No need, your work experience alone is already enough.
zh: 不用,你工作經驗就已經足夠了

en: I just directly say that I don't know.
zh: 我都直接說我不會

en: If you've already been in the industry for a while, don't bother pursuing further education. If you're just starting out, you might consider it.
zh: 如果已經在業界一段時間了就不要補學歷,如果剛出社會可以考慮補學歷

en: You need to be sure that when I say it, you'll understand xdd.
zh: 你要確定我講出來你會聽得懂xdd

en: But here, everyone speaks Chinese, and I'm the only one who stands out.
zh: 可是這裡大家都講中文,只有我是異類

en: I'm too embarrassed to interrupt everyone here.
zh: 我不好意思打擾這裡大家說話

en: As long as the company is in dire need of people, they don't really care whether you're experienced or not.
zh: 只要公司足夠缺人,他們根本不在意是否資深

en: You're welcome to teach me how to code.
zh: 歡迎教我如何寫程式

en: Only kids make choices; I want to learn everything.
zh: 小孩子才做選擇,我全都要學

en: This is like the countless ways to cook food; there's no saying what is absolutely good or absolutely bad.
zh: 這就像是食物料理方法百百種,沒有說決對的好或決對的壞

en: I no longer actively send out my resume; I just wait for headhunters to contact me.
zh: 我現在也已經不主動履歷了,都是等獵頭找我

en: We need to be proactive to create opportunities.
zh: 我們要主動才會有機會

en: It's okay, you can speak for ten minutes on both Sunday and Monday.
zh: 沒關係,你可以禮拜天跟星期一各講十分鐘

en: I'm just using GPT (x)
zh: 我只是在用GPT(x

en: No, I'm quite old.
zh: 英文怎麼說

en: Maybe, take a guess.
zh: 可能有,你猜猜

en: I was programming yesterday and went to sleep at 4 AM.
zh: 我昨天在寫程式呀,到四點去睡叫了

en: Did you go out for Dragon Boat Festival?
zh: 你端午節有出去玩嗎?

en: Everyone needs to discuss how to start the server. Currently, the program on [GIT] cannot start the server.
zh: 需要大家一起討論如何啟動伺服器,目前[GIT]上的程式無法啟動伺服器

en: Move the leetcode files to the leetcode folder.
zh: 將leetcode檔案移到leetcode資料夾中。
